title: What kind of font it have?
author: puma999

comments.content:
Could have been started with [Avant-Garde Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415110155/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/avant-garde-gothic) ITC mainly playing with alternate glyphs and removing/adding strokes.

EDIT: Kevin found a match and as stated in the comments as "[...] based on the variations and similarities of AVANT GARDE Typeface"
